content: As far as I know, rustc does not support loading custom LLVM plugins like what clang can do with -Xclang -load. Are there any plans on implementing this feature in rustc?
You can pass arbitrary LLVM arguments, is that enough?
No, I checked the full list of available LLVM arguments via rustc -Cllvm-args=-h, and I didn't find an argument that can be used for loading custom plugins
